text: Kē timīlē yō bhannaṭhāndachau ki timī chāḍidi'inēchau?, Hunata allāhalē ahilēsam'ma timīmadhyē tinīharūlā'ī pratiṣṭhita banā'ēkō chaina, jō mujāhida (dharmayud'dha garnē vyakti) chan ra jasalē allāha, usakō rasūla ra mōminharū bāhēka kasailā'ī ghaniṣṭa mitra banā'ēna. Ra allāha timrā sampūrṇa kriyākalāpabārē jāndacha
